title: Rediscovery: art media - paper mache
brief_description: Presents the basic process involved in sculpting and creating 3-D forms using paper mache - one of the cheapest and easiest ways of creating objects. Jewelry, toy houses, elephants, birds etc - from paper strips to paper mulch students develop their own creative ideas. Suitable for upper primary and secondary levels.
